title: WhatsApp may have installed spyware on my Pixel 2 - how to remove and ensure removal?
content:
Hi,

I believe I may have had spyware installed on my Pixel 2 via the recent WhatsApp hack: https://sg.news.yahoo.com/whatsapp-discovers-spyware-infected-call-030145335.html

I received a WhatsApp call from an unusual number last week (May 7th or 8th) before the patch to fix the bug and have noticed unusual battery behavior since. I'm concerned spyware is running in the background.

Is there a way to either/both:
Verify whether my device has been infected
Ensure that the spyware is removed even if I take steps to reflash the bootloader and OS (if possible) or perform a factory reset

Thanks!
